meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Leanne Vincent Rob Liguori Kirstin Cutts Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7477.

td.p: Leanne Vincent, a geospatial analyst from Calgary, Alberta, Canada
Rob Liguori, a research editor from Brooklyn, New York
Kirstin Cutts, a graduate student from Austin, Texas (whose 4-day cash winnings total $49,403)

tr.td: (Sarah: A drive to central Massachusetts, a step back in time to the early 19th century.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Leanne: Who are the Philistines and the Israelites?)
[Originally ruled incorrect; reversed before the Daily Double at clue 29]

David and Goliath (or the Philistines and the Israelites)

RobLeanne
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 14):

tr.td: (Alex: We'll give you a country. You name the nation across its longest western border.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
KirstinWhat is your what you gave up for Lent?
$2,801
RobWhat is what did you give up for Lent?
$7,001
What did you give up for Lent?')
